project.name: EduCore AI – Assessment Microservice
project.description: Roadmap and governance for EduCore AI Assessment Microservice as per README v4.3.1, featuring dual-DB, proctoring, AI lineage, and full integrations.

ai_responsibility: Ask clarifying questions in plain language only when essential
Generate, validate, and store all artifacts per phase
Maintain context and audit logs across all phases
Perform rollbacks if any validation gate fails

metadata.author: AI Program Lead
metadata.upgrade_note: Aligned to README v4.3.1; phases 01–07 set to Ready

features.note: Features array initialized. Individual features will be added as they are planned and implemented. Each feature follows the unified SDLC phase structure.

features.name: OpenAI Theoretical Question Generation + Validation
notes: Replaced theoretical mocks with OpenAI-backed generation (medium difficulty, mixed types).
Added AI validation (clarity, fairness, hallucination, difficulty, skill relevance) with audit trail logging.
Implemented DevLab theoretical generation handler with difficulty pattern and fallback.

features.name: Post-Course Exam Flow (Camera, Proctoring, Results)
notes: Implements stable Baseline flow for post-course: camera gating, one-question-per-page, autosave state, submit -> results.
Adds 3-strike proctoring events with incident logging and auto-cancel redirect.

features.name: Exam Submission & Grading Pipeline
notes: POST /api/exams/:examId/submit implemented end-to-end including grading, per-skill aggregation, Mongo update, and outbox inserts.

features.title: Camera Activation at Exam Start
features.description: User must allow camera before beginning the exam; ProctoringSession tracks camera state.

features.title: Focus-Loss Violation Tracking
features.description: Tracks tab-switch and focus-loss events; cancels exam after 3 violations.

features.title: Forced Medium Difficulty for Theoretical Exam Questions
features.description: All theoretical exam questions use medium difficulty unless explicitly requested by DevLab external API.

features.title: Exam Timing & Expiration
features.description: Adds duration, expiration, start/end timestamps, and blocking logic.

features.title: Exam Grading v1 + External Integrations
features.description: Theoretical + coding grading, per-skill aggregation, PG/Mongo updates, and pushes to Directory, Skills Engine, Course Builder, Protocol Camera.

features.name: DevLab Coding Questions Integration
notes: Assessment sends coding requests to DevLab via unified /api/data-request endpoint.
Coding questions are stored in examPackage.coding_questions with skills, humanLanguage, difficulty, and requested_at metadata.

features.name: Email Alerts on Exam Cancellation (Admin Only)
notes: Sends admin-only Resend email to NOTIFY_ADMIN_EMAIL when an attempt is canceled (proctoring violations or manual cancel).
Idempotent guards ensure a single email per canceled attempt (rowCount check on status transition).
Logs “Email sent successfully” on success; warns if env vars missing.
features.commit: feat: email alerts for exam cancellation via Resend API (admin only)

phases.title: Initial Development Setup
phases.objective: Initialize environment, repository, CI/CD, and baseline configuration.

phases.title: Assessment API v1 – Exams/Attempts/Packages with Mock Fallbacks
User Dialogue & Requirements Analysis
phases.objective: Gather project requirements through AI-human dialogue and define functional scope.

phases.title: Feature Planning
phases.objective: Transform requirements into actionable features and a structured release roadmap.

phases.title: Design & Architecture
phases.objective: Design system architecture, components, APIs, and data flows according to project goals.

phases.title: Security & Compliance Planning
phases.objective: Define security posture, compliance mapping, risk management, and response protocols.

phases.title: AI Design & Prompt Engineering
phases.objective: Design AI integration workflows, prompts, and API interaction layers for automation.

phases.title: Implementation
phases.objective: Implement the full software system (frontend, backend, AI integrations) following all specifications.

phases.title: Testing & Verification
phases.objective: Perform automated and manual tests to validate functionality, performance, and security.

phases.title: Code Review & Deployment
phases.objective: Finalize code reviews, perform production deployment, validate stability, and hand over maintenance.

real_sdlc.note: All templates use production-grade database connections and API integrations

feature_based_tracking.note: All tracking and refinements organized by features

non_technical_mode.human_input: simple text confirmations or approvals only

phase_updates.title: Baseline Exam AI Scaffold
notes: Added dynamic AI-based question generation per skill with REST integrations and baseline exam build route.

phase_updates.title: Code Generation
notes: REST-only, mock JSON data, demo token required
Security gates per Phase 05 applied
AI integration boundaries per Phase 06 respected

decisions.summary: Defer explicit regional data residency enforcement to Phase 07 environment provisioning
decisions.rationale: Environment and infrastructure controls are defined in Phase 07; GDPR references maintained in compliance docs

phase_updates.title: Implementation & Development
notes: Demo constraint active: mock JSON APIs; migrate to Postgres + Mongo for prod.
Awaiting decision on CI/CD config versioning to avoid overwriting existing Phase 01 file.

summary.notes: DB health suite failed to run due to model import in test context; API and Swagger tests passed.

ci_cd.backend: Railway (validated config presence and runtime entrypoint)

phase_updates.title: Frontend Service Adapters
notes: Axios http client with env-based baseURL; supports Vite and Next public env variables

phase_updates.title: Logo Asset Rebuild & Cache Invalidation
notes: Migrated branding assets to .png and updated references; cleared local Vite cache; built for verification

phase_updates.title: Static Asset Cache Purge and Redeploy
notes: Forced clean build and redeploy to invalidate CDN cache for /logo-day.png and /logo-night.png

phase_updates.title: Asset Inclusion Verification & Forced Sync
notes: Explicitly added logo PNGs to Git and pushed to main to force inclusion in Vercel build

phase_updates.title: Frontend Theme Finalization & Dependency Sync
notes: Dark Emerald AI theme verified; dependency lockfile synced; Vercel rebuild triggered

phase_updates.title: Logo Sizing & Alignment Adjustment
notes: Logo resized to h-8 sm:h-10 md:h-12; object-contain; aligned with label via flex items-center and hover scale

phase_updates.title: Database Connectivity Restoration (Railway)
notes: Added robust env fallbacks: Postgres (SUPABASE_DB_URL|POSTGRES_URL|DATABASE_URL), Mongo (MONGO_DB_URI|MONGO_URI)
Post-deploy health checks expected to return ok=true for both databases

phase_updates.title: Database Schema and Health Route Repair
notes: Ensured PG enum exam_type exists and verified; simplified Mongo health listing; removed deprecated mongoose connect options

phase_updates.title: Backend Stability Upgrade
notes: Safe MongoDB health route (no regex filter)
Automatic enum/schema verification via runBootstrapMigrations(pool)

phase_updates.title: Theme Variable Injection
notes: Injected Dark Emerald CSS variable system (non-destructive); no automatic body class applied

branding: title updated to EduCore AI – Assessment Center

phase_updates.title: Tailwind-Native Theme Toggle & Logo Fix
notes: Dropped dependency on custom CSS day/night variables; use Tailwind dark class globally
Dynamic logo switching (day/night) and theme persistence via localStorage

phase_updates.title: Navbar & Logo Fix (Tailwind Consistency and Asset Resolution)
notes: Navbar fixed at top with Tailwind-native backgrounds and shadow; page content padded to avoid overlap
Reactive logo switching using Vite public paths for light/dark themes

phase_updates.title: Release & Deployment
notes: REST-only integrations and demo mock-data environment reflected per README and integration-specifications.

phase_updates.title: Implementation Cleanup for Rebuild
notes: Removed legacy service implementations to prepare for a fresh Phase 07 rebuild while retaining deployment scaffolding.
Trimmed backend dependencies to express, cors, and helmet to keep the Railway service deployable during refactor.

phase_updates.title: Database Integration

tasks.name: Connect Supabase PostgreSQL
tasks.description: Configured pg pool and /health/postgres endpoint using SUPABASE_DB_URL from Railway.

notes: Phase 07: Connected Supabase PostgreSQL successfully; verified deployment via /health/postgres route.

phase_updates.title: Phase 07.3 – Database Schema Construction
notes: Refined PostgreSQL initialization script to align exactly with templates/Database_Schema_Spec.md.
Normalized MongoDB models to snake_case fields and schema expectations; confirmed health routes expose database readiness.

phase_updates.title: Phase 07.3 – Database Schema Construction

ai_decision.summary: Extended schema hardening and observability for dual-database layer.
ai_decision.rationale: Ensure enum parity during migrations, enforce attempt-to-package linkage, and expose richer health telemetry before proceeding to Phase 08.

notes: Added defensive enum synchronization and attempt number validation to PostgreSQL bootstrap script.
Required attempt bindings, default metadata shells, and user index to speed MongoDB queries.
Expanded health endpoints to report enum coverage and observed Mongo collections for readiness checks.

summary.notes: Proceeding to pre-release tag with action: run init.sql to create PG tables prior to enabling write flows.

phase_updates.title: Add Proctoring Models
notes: Introduced ProctoringSession and ProctoringViolation collections to support camera activation and focus tracking.

phase_updates.title: Add Proctoring Routes
notes: Added start_camera and focus_violation endpoints; enforced camera gate and attempt cancellation on third violation.

phase_updates.title: Add Proctoring Tests
notes: Validated camera activation gate and auto-cancel behavior on third focus violation.

phase_updates.title: Add Proctoring Deployment Checklist
notes: Checklist includes environment variables, Mongo indexes, health checks, and alerting for proctoring services.

phase_updates.title: Submission & Grading (POST /api/exams/:examId/submit)
notes: Fix: POST /api/exams/:examId/submit attempt_not_found bug
Root cause: inconsistent ID typing at boundaries (string vs number) causing WHERE ea.attempt_id = $1 to miss rows.
Actions: Added Number() casting in controller and service; added console.debug diagnostics; unified Postgres connection source.
Files changed: controllers/examsController.js, services/core/examsService.js, config/supabaseDB.js, docs/api/assessment.md, backend/tests/integration/*
Diagnostics: Added [submitExam-controller] and [submitAttempt-service] prefixed logs for inputs and SELECT results.
DB: Connection now selected via SUPABASE_POOLER_URL || SUPABASE_DB_URL || DATABASE_URL with masked info logging.

phase_updates.title: DevLab Coding Grading Integration
notes: Integrated coding grading via DevLab using unified envelope.
Used requester_service='assessment'.
Added programming_language to coding flows.
Stored coding results in Mongo and merged into Postgres grading pipeline.

additional_updates.title: AI Validation, Proctoring, and Retake System
additional_updates.notes: Validation gate on question build, live anti-cheat logging, AI-driven retake generation and cooldown.

additional_updates.title: Post-Course Retake Handling & Attempt Tracking
additional_updates.notes: Enforce Directory policy; cooldowns; override; result versioning.

additional_updates.title: Proctoring v1 added: camera activation + focus monitoring + auto-cancel.
Exam Timing & Expiration
additional_updates.notes: Added duration_minutes and expires_at with lifecycle enforcement, remaining-time endpoint, and docs updates.

additional_updates.title: Exam grading v1: theoretical + coding grading, per-skill aggregation, and external integration pushes implemented.
DevLab Integration Update (MongoDB exam_package theoretical fields)
notes: Added topic_id, topic_name, humanLanguage to each theoretical question in MongoDB exam_packages.
Builder and controller updated with safe defaults and optional fields. No PostgreSQL changes.

additional_updates.title: DevLab Coding Questions Integration
notes: Implemented coding question request flow using unified DevLab envelope.
Persisted DevLab coding questions into Mongo exam_package.coding_questions along with skills, humanLanguage, difficulty, and requested_at.
Kept PostgreSQL schema unchanged; coding content is stored only in Mongo, grading will be handled in a later phase.

additional_updates.title: DevLab Old Endpoint Cleanup
notes: Removed deprecated DevLab endpoints and services.
Standardized system to use only INTEGRATION_DEVLAB_DATA_REQUEST_URL.
Prepared backend for Phase 08.3 coding answers grading.
